short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays 1.8 skin layers on Enjin websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enjin support for Minecraft 1.8 sucks. This Chrome extension fixes that by displaying user skins with 1.8 layers.

Check out the source code at https://github.com/w00tmast3r/enjin-minecraft-fix
